name: CupertinoTimerPicker
desc: A countdown timer picker in iOS style.

fields.name: mode
fields.desc: The mode of the timer picker.

fields.name: initialTimerDuration
fields.desc: The initial duration of the countdown timer.

fields.name: minuteInterval
fields.desc: The granularity of the minute spinner. Must be a positive integer factor of 60.

fields.name: secondInterval
fields.desc: The granularity of the second spinner. Must be a positive integer factor of 60.

fields.name: onTimerDurationChanged
fields.desc: Callback called when the timer duration changes.

fields.name: alignment
fields.desc: Defines how the timer picker should be positioned within its parent.

fields.name: selectionOverlayBuilder
fields.desc: A function that returns a widget that is overlaid on the picker to highlight the currently selected entry.
